root.name: Cook, Serve, Delicious!
root.description: Cook, Serve, Delicious! is a game that challenges its players to fulfill food requests and work orders for a constant stream of customers. The player starts with a basic eatery, cooking simple deep-fried foods. Over time, more complicated foods and recipes will be available to unlock. Additionally, new equipment and improvements can be purchased to allow the chef to focus on food and less on chores.Game progress comes in the form of additional prep stations becoming available with star-rating upgrades to your restaurant. In order to increase the star rating, specific goals must be reached such as number of days spent cooking or number of dishes upgraded. Certain dishes have available upgrades that will increase the difficulty of the prep and the price of the meal. There are also catering events which are one-off challenges with specific menus intended to prepare a few dishes for as many customers as possible in a short amount of time.Currently available for the PC, Mac, and iPad platforms, this game is controlled with a series of keystrokes unique to the food or task being asked of the player.
